sentences: Ta on juba töötanud firmas kolm aastat.
Meie meeskond on palju töötanud selle projekti kallal.
context: The word 'töötanud' is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'töötama', which means 'to work'. It indicates completed action in the past. The '-nud' ending is characteristic of the perfect tense/past participle in Estonian, showing that the working has been done and completed.
